text: is a Japanese Egyptologist. He currently is Director of the Institute of Egyptology, A Short History of Work in Egypt by Waseda University Waseda University, Tokyo He is the first president of an online college Cyber University. ==Publications== *Non-destructive pyramid investigation, 1987 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese Egyptologists Category:Waseda University alumni Category:Waseda University faculty
title: Sakuji Yoshimura
